title: Embattled IMF Chief to Stay Following Investigation Into World Bank Data Rigging
sub_head: Kristalina Georgieva will remain at the helm of the International Monetary Fund, which has been damaged by scrutiny
body:
The executive board of the International Monetary Fund said it has full confidence in Kristalina Georgieva as its managing director, putting an end to weeks of uncertainty while the board investigated her role in a data-manipulation scandal at the World Bank, where she had been chief executive.
The investigation centered on whether Ms. Georgieva had tried to boost Chinaâ€™s standing in a high-profile World Bank report.
